sentences.en: A constitution was established and the Confederation was born.
sentences.cn: 宪法建立了并且联邦出生.

sentences.en: After Yao died, Shun became head of the tribal confederation.
sentences.cn: 尧去世后, 舜继承了部落联盟领袖的位置.

sentences.en: Caritas Internationalis ( International Confederation of Catholic Charities )
sentences.cn: 国际慈善社 ( 国际天主教慈善社联合会)(慈善社 )
邦联与联邦稍有点差别.

sentences.en: In 1867 it became the capital of the newly formed confederation.
sentences.cn: 1867年成为刚成立的联盟的首都.

sentences.en: International confederation of Free Trade Union ( ICFTU )
sentences.cn: 国际自由工会联合会 ( 自由工联 )

sentences.en: Italy has won the European Confederation Cup 12 times since 1981.
sentences.cn: 自从1981年以来,意大利队已经12次捧走欧洲联盟杯.

sentences.en: List each province and territoy and tell when each one joined Confederation?
sentences.cn: 列举每个省份及特区,并说出何时加入同盟?

sentences.en: No State shall enter into any treaty, alliance, or confederation.
sentences.cn: 各州不得缔结任何条约 、 同盟或联邦.

sentences.en: Once more Athens flared into importance as the head of a confederation.
sentences.cn: 雅典又陡然再次焕发出光芒,跃居同盟首脑的重要地位.

sentences.en: Other organizations have joined the confederation for mutual benefit.
sentences.cn: 其他组织为了共同的利益也加入了这个联盟。

sentences.en: Pedro Montes, leader of the main union confederation, opposed Mr Morales's plan for a referendum, saying it would set people against each other.
sentences.cn: 主要工会联盟的领导者佩德罗·蒙特斯，反对莫拉莱斯关于公民投票的计划。他说，公民投票将让人们相互反目。

sentences.en: The European Builders Confederation has a membership of over 350,000 building companies.
sentences.cn: 欧洲建筑商联合会拥有逾35万家建筑公司会员。

sentences.en: The official trades union council voted to disband itself and re-form as a confederation.
sentences.cn: 这个官方的工会委员会投票决定解体然后重新组成联盟。
哪一份文件令同盟合法?

sentences.en: You said something about the integration of the resistance movement into the galactic confederation.
sentences.cn: 你说过一些有关将抵抗运动整合进入银河联盟。

words.tran_cn: 使联盟；使联合；同伙；帮凶

phrases.tran_cn: 十三州邦联宪法（美国第一部宪法）

trans.tran_en: a group of people, political parties, or organizations that have united for political purposes or trade
